definition: to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根據血壓控制情況調整兩組的降壓藥劑量。

sentences.english: This is because the principle of the current step-down in the great emphasis on individual drugs.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲目前的降壓原則中十分強調個體化用藥。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate a new automatic multiple-drug delivery algorithm for controlled hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價一種新的用於控制性降壓的自動給藥方案。

sentences.english: That doesn’t mean anyone older than 85 should stop taking blood pressure medication.
sentences.chinese: 但這不意味着85歲以上的人就應停止服用降壓藥。

sentences.english: Doctors usually prefer people with diabetes to take blood pressure drugs called ACE inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 醫生經常糖尿病人喫的降壓藥叫做ACE抑制劑。

sentences.english: The effects of pressure change rate in carotid sinus on depressor reflex was observed.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要觀察竇內壓的變化速率對降壓反射的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the antihypertensive effect and safety of Beijing Hypotensive No. 0 in treatment of hypertension(Hp).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察北京降壓0號治療原發性高血壓的療效。
微型低電壓，精密降壓控制器。

sentences.english: I hconsumed injections, Can I take the medicine orally?
sentences.chinese: 常用降壓藥我不喜歡打針，能喫些口服藥嗎？

sentences.english: A kind of energy-conserving by step-down method is proposed based on fuzzy control.
sentences.chinese: 提出了電機輕載降壓節能模糊控制方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of five kinds of anti-hypertensive medications on the middle-age men's sexual function.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究五種常用降壓藥物對中年男性性功能的影響。

sentences.english: Esmolol may be superior to sodium nitroprusside in maintaining MAP in endonasal sinus procedures.
sentences.chinese: 艾司洛爾對此類手術的降壓效果可能優於硝普鈉。

sentences.english: To improve the manufacture technology of Zhenju Jiangya Tablet, and ensure the quality of the drug.
sentences.chinese: 目的改進珍菊降壓片的生產工藝，保證藥品質量。

sentences.english: Blood-pressure medications and some antibiotics can cause balance problems.
sentences.chinese: 降壓藥物和某些抗生素也能導致平衡問題。

sentences.english: Grassi: Anti-hypertensive drugs may have heterogeneous effects in obese hypertensive patients.
sentences.chinese: 降壓藥物對肥胖患者的體重有何影響？

definition: to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
